function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Challenges in face-to-face consultations during the COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Limited access to in-person healthcare and potential for disease spread","Mitigation":"Implementing alternative methods such as smartphone technology for remote consultations","Technologies":"Smartphone applications for virtual consultations","People":"Patients, healthcare providers","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, government health departments"},{"Description":"Increased use of smartphone technology for COVID-19 data and information updates","Impact":"Reliance on potentially inaccurate or unreliable data sources","Mitigation":"Ensuring the use of trusted and verified sources for COVID-19 information","Technologies":"Data verification and validation tools, official health organization apps","People":"General public","Owner":"Health authorities, technology companies"},{"Description":"Disruption of economic and social wellbeing due to COVID-19 impact","Impact":"Financial instability, social isolation, mental health challenges","Mitigation":"Implementing economic relief measures, promoting social support networks, and providing mental health resources","Technologies":"Financial aid distribution systems, social support platforms, mental health apps","People":"General public, vulnerable populations","Owner":"Government, mental health organizations"}]}
